thread.title: Ivanka's Trump's Ditching The Family Business To ‘Support’ Her Husband In Washington D.C.
thread.title_full: Ivanka's Trump's Ditching The Family Business To ‘Support’ Her Husband In Washington D.C.

author: Mustafa Gatollari
title: Ivanka's Trump's Ditching The Family Business To ‘Support’ Her Husband In Washington D.C.
text:
There's been a lot of hullaballoo not just surrounding Trump's conference today, and Rex Tillerson's hearing , but in the recent news cycle about the role Trump's children will have in the White House.
Not only are they getting unprecedented security clearances and access to levels of government than any other presidential family , but there's been a lot of talk as to whether or not Trump will appoint his own children to top government positions.
There was some backlash to Ivanka Trump's husband, Jared Kushner, being offered the senior advisor position in the Donald's cabinet, which left many people wondering what role Ivanka would play in her father's administration.

And Ivanka's latest Facebook post declaring that she's taking a formal leave of absence from her company, has got some people wondering what role she'll have. 
Many, however, were overwhelmingly supportive of Ivanka's post and thought that her decision to "step down" from her own company was a classy move.

facebook 

Some people had ideas of their own as to what her role should be. 
facebook 

Others, were more critical of Ivanka's decision and fear that nepotism will come into play if she were offered a potential role in government. Remember when the right was pissed HRC was working on healthcare? Now #Ivanka 's attending meetings & #JaredKushner is advising. #nepotism 
— Politics In Pink (@PinkPolitical) January 9, 2017  
Wow. Camera just panned to #Ivanka and you could see the pain she's feeling for her dummy dad. @CNN @AlecBaldwin #TrumpPressConference 
— J.A.M (@jmorART) January 11, 2017  
Here Are Some Photos Of The #Chinese Factory Where #Ivanka #Trump Shoes Are Made https://t.co/8wto8uV3Ti pic.twitter.com/dHZsJ7bwlV 
— Gregory Grushko (@ggrushko) January 8, 2017  
Ivanka will be living right around the corner from the Obamas in Washington. So Jared can drop by to borrow a cup of decency #Ivanka 
— Paul Rudnick (@PaulRudnickNY) January 7, 2017  
Eric, Don Jr., #Ivanka - you'll find
These creepy young grifters will rob us all blind pic.twitter.com/bef4yLDye5 
— cassandracarolina (@cassandra17lina) January 5, 2017  
When there was little to no #msm reporting of #Ivanka 's holiday with #Putin 's girlfriend, I knew we were in trouble. Aug '16 @msnbc @cnn 
— Mark Brislin ? (@brislin_mark) December 30, 2016 As of now, whether or not Ivanka will be offered a role in government is all speculation. But with her giving up her business, moving to Washington, and being granted access to the White House, it's only a matter of time.
